remarks: Absorption of vector sum into span of pair.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Apr-2015.)
statement:
lspprabs.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lspprabs.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
lspprabs.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lspprabs.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
lspprabs.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lspprabs.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
lspprabs $p |- ( ph -> ( N ` { X , ( X .+ Y ) } ) = ( N ` { X , Y } ) ) $.
